Html:
I've recently started to use the batch tools as I have different sets for Cat, Bear, Tree and Boomkin.
The only problem I encountered with it is that I can't tell Rawr I have multiple of the same item.
For example I have 2 Leggings of the Honored, but the optimizer doesn't know this so it won't use different gems/enchants for Cat and Bear.

Am I missing something or is it just not possible at the moment  to use multiple of the same items in the batch tools?

This is currently not possible for the batch version of optimize/upgrade. This is mainly a user interface limitation. If we implement some way of specifying the number of particular items that is available it shouldn't be hard to extend the optimizer to support it.

As a workaround you could go into "Edit Items", and copy the stats of the item you have a duplicate of into a new item, and just give it a bogus item ID.  Not ideal, but then you can select both 'versions' :p
